I rise in support of H.R. 4431, the Improving Capital Allocation for  Newcomers Act of 2025, or ICAN Act, offered by Mr. Timmons and Ms.  Pettersen.

Like the DEAL Act, the ICAN Act also amends the definition of  ``venture capital fund'' under the Investment Company Act. Currently,  in order to qualify…
